segments.text: This is a nice place , but you need to get some furniture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had planned to . I can bring some from my place . And there's some more at my parents ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , I have . There is one in my old house . And I have another one from college at my parents ' house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . You can put one in this room and put the other one in that room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it is a good idea . You can stay in my house for the night if you would like to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . By the way , can I take a shower ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , but I don't have hot water , yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they're coming tomorrow morning to turn the gas on . My phone should be working then , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , do you want to go outside for dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I can't cook anything until tomorrow , anyway . Let's go to the restaurant nearby . It's my treat .
segments.speaker: S2
